title: List of typefaces included in Adobe Font Folio
content:
I've been searching the Adobe.com website high and low and can't seem to find a list (PDF or txt) of all the typefaces included in the current edition of the Adobe Font Folio. Does anybody know where to find it (before I start bugging Adobe customer support)?

THX
author: Bald Condensed

comments.content:
after some googling i found a link in a [press release](http://web.archive.org/web/20141012030945/http:/www.adobeforums.com/cgi-bin/webx/.1dea4840) of adobe by thomas phinney.

you can find the list [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20141012030945/http:/www.adobeforums.com/cgi-bin/webx?233@@.1dea4840/71!enclosure=.3bb84146)

It seems that Adobe Inc. has removed the file FFOTEFontList.pdf, which documents the most recent font collection, from its Adobe website.

But this file is still downloadable elsewhere on the Internet, e.g. here

[http://www.xchangefr.com/pdf/FFOTEFontList.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20141012030945/http:/www.xchangefr.com/pdf/FFOTEFontList.pdf "http://www.xchangefr.com/pdf/FFOTEFontList.pdf")

Furthermore, my two own websites

[http://www.forgers.de](http://web.archive.org/web/20141012030945/http:/www.forgers.de/ "http://www.forgers.de")  
 [http://www.sanskritweb.net/forgers/#adobe9](http://web.archive.org/web/20141012030945/http:/www.sanskritweb.net/forgers/#adobe9 "http://www.sanskritweb.net/forgers/#adobe9")

document the entire Adobe font stuff - both old (PS) and new (OT).
Thanks a bunch people, just what the doctor ordered. :^)

And just for future reference, the Typography forum on Adobe.com has a sticky posting that lists all the fonts. You can see it at [http://www.adobeforums.com/cgi-bin/webx/.1dea4840/87](http://web.archive.org/web/20141012030945/http:/www.adobeforums.com/cgi-bin/webx/.1dea4840/87 "http://www.adobeforums.com/cgi-bin/webx/.1dea4840/87")
